values: Sitting here with Jared, Corey, and all of Virginia Tech (minus 30,000 people) at Awful Arthurs doing my last karaoke. It's been a good run, but the turn out has been less than amazing. Kinda sad, but that means I'll have my Thursday's for awhile...woo hoo!!!

isn't being drunk, angry, and shoe-less a bitch?

i had a very good weekend a home...minus half an hour of intellectually challengness.

Make sure you take a listen t my album on iTunes
My album went live today with the national release of "a beautiful destruction" on iTunes.  put up some reviews of it for me!!!

And now, a Haiku about Williamsburg

'Burg is expensive
The humidity sucks balls
But I suck balls too bitch

:)

'Ello all.  To recap the important things:

- We're ganna blow up a satellite that died on take off.
- Obma, My Bama!!!!
- Britney may be doing "not crazy".  Upgrade?
- JackRussell got married.  My best wishes go to them.  From what I hear, they're doing well and staying busy.  All my love.
- Phi Mu Alpha rocks and I'm having a great time being a brother to these awesome guys.

Go to MySapce to check out the new demos and head to MyWebsite to check out new information on CD sales and shows.

Well, HELLO WORLD.  Long time no bitch!!!

Classes have been intense as always.  I am enjoying being a Business Major.  Write the music/learn the numbers.  This I can handle.

If you haven't taken a look, it is 2000 & (H)8.  Go to my MySpace to get all the hate you can stand!!!

Big week in the 'Burg!  I arrived to metal and drag queens.  OMG!  David knows how to treat a girl after being gone so long!!!  XOXO David.

I spent most of my time at home with Dad and Derrick.  It was very nice to see them and spend time with pops.  

Kenny...always a good time.

Radford for HELL WEEK!!!

I'm pretty sure I've fucked up something way beyond repair.  It's dead...and I wasn't ready to let it die.

Grrr...Arrrg.

I should hire a professional to gag me when I started saying stupid shit.

ve been hit with the writing bug again. I've actually been waking up with melodies in my head, given to me in my dreams. Very haunting and aggressive.

C.S.P's "a beautiful destruction" has just not come together like I hoped. Although the CD has gotten really good reviews, the over all feeling is very dark, and preforming those songs seems like it may be...painful, and maybe even dull. That CD was a reflection of 5 years of love gone wrong. Finishing it was the best emotional release I've ever experienced. So...once it was done..it fizzled out. Booking shows with that CD was no picnic either. Venue after venue had called me back saying, "Umm, its really good, but its a downer man." And it is...I'm not really sure what to do with this peice of my musical history. I am proud, however, of what I did, and the honesty that came out of the album.

I'm rather tired of writing sad, sappy songs (for the moment), but these riffs and melodies coming to me not are not meant to be taken lightly. I've never been able to grasp the concept of "positive rock". I usually associate distorted guitars with a distorted soul. 

We'll see where these songs take me in terms of lyrics. Write now its just about the music.

I am looking to form a band. Anyone interested should hit me up ASAP. I need a bassist and drummer (and maybe a second guitarist). To get a feeling of the music I'm writing, take a look at post_social'a music (my former band)

http://www.myspace.com/postsocial

Hit me up and let me know what you'd like to get in to. Radford/Christiansburg/Blacksburg prefered

Bull Dyke and Krista broke up.  It was hard and ready to happen.  Bull Dyke's been getting the rough end of the stick recentely, so I got him nice and drunk after the fall out happened.

Rejoyce!!!!

Joss Wheadon (Buffy: The Vampire Slayer) decided that, "Hey, if I cant get ass*holes to resign contracts and do another season of Buffy, then I'll just put it to a comic book.

Thats right mofos...

The Comic Book Series, "Buffy: Season 8" was released and it is the only real Buffy material that Joss has done since the end of the TV Show (except Fray, a futureistic Slayer).  Season 8 picks up right where season 7 left oFF on UPN.  AMEN!!!

silverchair still have it.

"Stalled at young modern station 
Arthritic conversation 
Life has a dead line lately 
Allergic and in the news"

-Daniel Johns

Sometimes your life really does mimic an online cartoon...
"Everyone else has had more sex than me!!!"...

I want to just f*ck my brains out for like....2 days...AND I CANT!!!

Bull Dyke is sitting here with a fucking fan blowing because of all the sex him and his girlfriend created steamed up the room...MY BED HASNT SEEN SEX ALL YEAR LONG!!!


Amen Bull Dyke......Amen

So...Um...

It feels very weird to sit and watch your friends' lives go to hell while you stand by and try to hold a smile.  Try to say something they know.  Try to fill a hole you don't fit into.

There are 4 elements in my life:
Earth = Kenny
Wind = Russ
Fire = David
Water = Derrick

Three of the elements have not been having a good run of it recently.  Not to air out peoples dirty laundry...but...Friends' father suicides/Friend thinks he is losing his mind/Friends' GF cheats on him (with a female) and is now on his own in a foriegn place with no where to go but home...and who wants to do that?

On top of that, my niece had a seizure(s)(sp?) the other day...post CAT-scans show two unexplained shadows...my sister is a fucking mess.

I am on high alert right now.  Everytime a phone rings or someone is yelling at ther "loved" one...I'm right there.  And I dont mind it.  It's just weird that three of the closest people in my life are suffering right now (heart/mind/soul)...and I can't band-aid this shit.

Princess - I love you...you know where to find me

K-Dawg - F11 is the way...if that doesnt fix it...we're all going to burn

Bull Dyke - You arent crazy...you're human...which means you're crazy.  You get the picture.

"Look at the state I'm in...
Staring at the walls again..."

My album is here.  It's selling quite well.  I'm happy with that.  I just wish I had the ability to play live.  I miss that...a lot

The new Finger Eleven album is not bad...but lacks the angst I'm use to.

Russ is getting ready to graduate.  He's been in a weird mood.  I understand...I dont wanna see him go.

Home for Spring Break 9th-18th.  Woo hoo.

Davida and I will paint the town for a bit before we have a fight and then make up (I can predict the future).

I miss the world a lil bit...but I like my corner too.

Guess what MOFOS....

THE CD IS HERE!!!

"A BEAUTIFUL DESTRUCTION" lives...

Go to carlslateproject.com to take a listen....want a copy? Message me and reserve your copy now for $5!!!!

Loves ya

-Carl

Well...we've given these dirty mothafuckas the chance to change shit...now lets see what they do!

I never, in my life, ever thought I'd be allowed to marry and man in Virginia...but I also never thought we'd pass legislation to make it an illegal act.

I life well spent,
an Angel has returned home,
and a Love reunited...

All reasons to rejoice
for an Angel...

I love you Boo Boo...
I will always be your little Bear

Had a feud with the family...its been resolved...I just hate being here and feeling like I'm somewhat involved when I'm not

Check out the website and send donations..."a beautiful destruction" must live!!!

More when there's more to say

Last night I saw MI:III...

I kind of forgive Tom alil bit now. It was a fucking awsome movie...ya know, as action and adventure flcks go...

Classes are going great. All these music classes are woven together so they're really helping catch up on my sight singing and learning to read music again.

I made Radford Singers AND Madrigals Choir (MADS is an upper classman choir and I got accepted as a first year Music Major...pat me on my back in you imgaination!)

ALL OF MY TEACHERS ROCK!!! The only thing that sucks is that I have class at 8am ALL SEMESTER...so I cant hang out with Russ and the gang as much during the week (I could...but I'd flunk out :( )

Had a Level 7 Panic Attack on Thursday (7 out of 10). I think I may be closterphobic (sp) because I never get panic attacks in class unless its a 40-50 class in a room made for 20 people...I feel squashed and stuck and hot and shit...I believe I can memorize and Buddhist Chant by the end of tonight to help me get through that one class....no biggy.

Everything on the up and up...wish I could get this album printed :( I'm really proud of everything on it and I just cant find the $300 to get it pressed. I could do a cheap CD-R and black and white cover...but I want this to be all that it can be...and its worth $300 on printing...just gotta earn that dough...

Just so you know...I'm STILL Housin'
-Carl/Bear

Classes rock...
Work sucks...
Russ rocks...
Girls suck...
JT rocks...
Killers are okay
Courtney Love forever

Packing...and loving it!!!

Last night in the burg.  Ganna play my final foosball game with Derrick at PNP.  If you wanna stop by and say hello/goodbye, please do.

I'll post again once I'm set up at Radford.

Much love
-carl/bear

Well...today starts my "Self-Imposed Exile" and 3 days of fasting.

I've learned that there are different levels of fasting.  You can literally not eat anything (think more like a hunger strike).  There are fasts that Buddhist Monks practice where they will drink 3oz of fruit juice in the morning to awaken their body, and then nothing.  Other relgious sects practice a fast by only drinking water when needed and a spoon full of rice a day.

Interesting stuff...I, myself, will not be fasting hunger-strike style.  I bought a little bag of rice to make if I need something to calm my stomach down.  I also bought some organic juice to get me through the next few days.  So my diet will consist of Rice, Juice, and water.  Thats it son.

11 hours so far without a cig.  Physically...fine.  Mentally...really want a drag.

I will be mixing and cleaning all day.

Talk to ya Sunday

-Carl

Well...

Things are good and bad.  Kinda lonley...but its driving me to finish this damn CD.  Lots of drinking and smoking...so...eh...could feel better mentally and physically.

Finishing on album art and shit.  You can see some of it here.

Mixing the rest of the music during my "Self-Imposed Exile".  Starting 8/6 I will will basically be unreachable until the 12th.  I'll be locked in my room mixing and printing and all the fun stuff that comes with finsihing a project like this.  During that time I will not be engaging in any fun activities like drinking or smoking or socializing.  I will be cleaning myself up while I finish my work.  If you need me badly leave a message on my phone and I will check it...otherwise, I will see you around the bend.  I love you guys...got to clean up some time.

BTW...got the new 30 Seconds to Mars CD.  Not bad...not as ground breaking as their first.

Lance Bass (dude from the 'Nsync) finally came out.  THANK GOD.  That was killing me.

Jarod Leto came out...then went back in.  That pisses me off.  DAMN YOU JORDAN...ANGELA IS FOR CRACKOW!!!

Mixing going well.  Art work not as easy as I thought.  Goose is helping me out with a lot of it though....more mentally than physically.


To all you former post_social groupies out there...this one's for you!!!


-C-Twig

and as faced the sun he cast no shadow

As they took his soul they stole his pride
As they took his soul they stole his pride

album art layout looks like train tracks and shoes...

heres to tomorrow

"I am so afraid of the gift you give me
I dont belong here and I am not well
I am so ashamed of the lie I am living
I'm right on the wrong side of it all"


I'm going to ask a question...please answer with honesty and bluntness.  I was provoked today and need opinions:

Today I encountered a lady who had a product that she said was 50% off.  She was clearly part, if not completly, African American.  The product she had did not ring up on the register as 50% off and it was missing a discount sticker that would suggest that it WAS 50% off...so I had to go make sure that product was indeed on clearance.  After what felt like forever, I found out that it was indeed 50% off.  The problem, I told her, was that she managed to pick up the ONLY one that didnt have the sticker...thats why I had to make sure we could take the price off at the register 

What I got was a 15 minute lecture on how rascist the bookstore was.  What angered me is that she implied that because I had to go "make sure she wasnt lying" (as she put it) that I was a racist.

I smiled and bit my tounge through the whole thing...nodding as she ripped me apart for being racist.  When she was done I explained again why I had to make sure the product was discounted and informed her that the back register wouldnt be as busy this time of day.  She said "Whatever" and walked off.

I then went upstairs and started crying.  I cried not only because I was upset about being called a rascist, but also that this woman, who has had to deal with racsim and sexism her whole life truley felt that my actions were racist.  I felt sympathetic to her probelm even though I dont feel I personaley was the cause of them.

...what REALLY PISSED ME OFF is that when I went back down stairs I took a closer look at the item and noticed that there was fresh sticker residue where a 50% off sticker use to be.  I took a closer look at the table she got the item from and EVERY SINGLE ONE OF THEM had a 50% sticker on them...not one was missed.  The way she attacked me and the new evidence I found lead me to believe that this female removed the sticker and wanted to see what would happened...which was me getting bitched at and feeling like an asshole simply because I'm white.  

My question is: Even though we still live in a racist society, are the actions this woman took to address a rasict issue justified?  Is she entitled to intentionally start an argument that would not have happened had she left the 50% sticker on the item?

It's one thing to address an obvious issue (the issue being that if she was white that I would not have questioned whether or not the product was discounted*).  It's another thing to make me feel like shit because she has an agenda.

*note I would double check any item in question, no matter what color a person is.

My opinion is that Martin Luther King Jr. and Ghandi are perfect examples of how diplomacy and peaceful demonstrations CAN lead to change.  Malcom X was a militant Black Muslim until he realized that the organization that he was with was corrupt and that by being MILITANT he could not spread his knowledge to a wider audience... and in the end, it was the militant party he left that murdered him...a man who had so much to say about something that NEEDED TO BE SAID.

MILITANCY leads to nothing and I am angry that this woman felt the need to start a fight.  I feel sympathy and anger for the young black male who gets followed in our bookstore simply because he is black...thats racism and uncalled for.  I HAVE NO SYMPATHY AT ALL for this black woman who made me feel like shit and made me feel sorry for her because she chose to provoke a racial issue that didnt have to happen.

What do you think?
